{"id":996847271,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4Â months","timestamp":1689611653,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"48 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/996847271/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Two Numbers II","memory":"71.2 MB","code":"/**\n * Definition for singly-linked list.\n * struct ListNode {\n *     int val;\n *     ListNode *next;\n *     ListNode() : val(0), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x) : val(x), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x, ListNode *next) : val(x), next(next) {}\n * };\n */\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n        ListNode* reverseList(ListNode* head) {        \n        if(head==NULL||head->next==NULL){return head;}\n        ListNode* prev=NULL;\n        ListNode* temp= head;\n       while(temp!=NULL){\n           ListNode* nxt= temp->next;\n           temp->next=prev;\n           prev=temp;\n           temp=nxt;\n       }\n        return prev;\n        \n       \n    }\n    ListNode* addTwoNumbers(ListNode* head1, ListNode* head2) {\n   ListNode* l1 = reverseList(head1);\n        ListNode* l2= reverseList(head2);\n              ListNode* dummy = new ListNode(-1);\n        ListNode* ans = dummy;\n        int carry = 0, sum = 0;\n        while (l1 || l2 || carry) {\n            sum = carry;\n            if (l1) {\n                sum += l1->val;\n                l1 = l1->next;\n            }\n            if (l2) {\n                sum += l2->val;\n                l2 = l2->next;\n            }\n            carry = sum / 10;\n            dummy->next = new ListNode(sum % 10);\n            dummy = dummy->next;\n        }\n        // return ans->next;  \n        return reverseList(ans->next);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-two-numbers-ii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
